sourcesContent:
import React, { FunctionComponent, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { RouteComponentProps, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Pokemon from '../models/pokemon'; import POKEMONS from '../models/mock-pokemon'; import formatType from '../components/helpers/format-type'; import formatDate from '../components/helpers/format-date'; // Assurez-vous que ce fichier existe et exporte `formatDate` type Params = { id: string }; const PokemonsDetail: FunctionComponent> = ({ match }) => { const [pokemon, setPokemon] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3000/pokemons/${match.params.id}') .then }, [match.params.id]); return (
{pokemon ? (

{pokemon.name}

edit
Nom {pokemon.name}
Points de vie {pokemon.hp}
Dégâts {pokemon.cp}
Types {pokemon.types.map(type => ( {type} ))}
Date de création {formatDate(pokemon.created)}
Retour
) : (

Loading...

)}
); } export default PokemonsDetail;
